Value: John is a network administrator for Acme Company. He has discovered that someone has registered a domain name that is spelled just one letter different than his company’s domain. The website with the misspelled URL is a phishing site. What best describes this attack?

Session hijacking is taking over an authenticated session. Cross-site request forgery sends fake requests to a website that purport to be from a trusted, authenticated user. Clickjacking attempts to trick users into clicking on something other than what they intended.
